Title: Inspektor Gadget Security Policies Can be Bypassed
Description: Security policies like [`allowed-gadgets`](https://inspektor-gadget.io/docs/latest/reference/restricting-gadgets),  [`disallow-pulling`](https://inspektor-gadget.io/docs/latest/reference/disallow-pulling), [`verify-image`](https://inspektor-gadget.io/docs/latest/reference/verify-assets#verify-image-based-gadgets) can be bypassed by a malicious client.
NotImpacted: All versions before 0.31.0, all versions starting from 0.40.0
